name: user-management-system
description: User Management System with Angular Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install concurrently --legacy-peer-deps && npm run install:angular-tools && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.render:build: echo '=== Testing Angular CLI ===' && ng version && echo '=== Installing Frontend Dependencies ===' && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install @angular-devkit/build-angular@16.2.12 @angular/cli@16.2.12 @angular/compiler-cli@16.2.12 @angular-devkit/core@16.2.12 @angular-devkit/schematics@16.2.12 @schematics/angular@16.2.12 --save-dev --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && echo '=== Verifying Angular Build Tools ===' && npm list @angular-devkit/build-angular && echo '=== Building Frontend ===' && ng build --configuration production && echo '=== Installing Backend Dependencies ===' && cd ../backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
